name: .LTC File Extension
summary: Learn about .LTC files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an LTC file with Luminar AI or Luminar Neo (Windows, Mac). To do so, select File â†’ Add Luminar AI/Neo Template Collection. Then, navigate to and open your LTC file. The templates your LTC file contains will then appear in Luminar's Templates tab.
